20110130151646.000|20110130151646.000|CC1|   UnitedHealthcare offered us  
20110130151646.000|20110130151648.000|CC1|     a specially trained RN

20110130151648.000|20110130151651.000|CC1| and understand all our options.
20110130151651.000|20110130151651.000|CC1|   For me cancer was as scary   
20110130151651.000|20110130151653.000|CC1|        as a fastball is

20110130152408.000|20110130152408.000|CC1|STUTTERING.                     
20110130152408.000|20110130152410.000|CC1|I MEAN REALLY FROM AGE 11 TO

20110130152822.000|20110130152822.000|CC1| When you've had one too many

20110130152827.000|20110130152830.000|CC1|      that you need help.       
20110130152830.000|20110130152832.000|CC1|That's the day you do something.
20110130152832.000|20110130152833.000|CC1|       Depression hurts.        
20110130152833.000|20110130152833.000|CC1|  Cymbalta can help with many   
20110130152833.000|20110130152836.000|CC1|    symptoms of depression.     
20110130152836.000|20110130152836.000|CC1| Tell your doctor right away if 
20110130152836.000|20110130152839.000|CC1|    your depression worsens,    
20110130152839.000|20110130152839.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20110130152839.000|20110130152842.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.
20110130152842.000|20110130152842.000|CC1|  Antidepressants can increase  
20110130152842.000|20110130152842.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20110130152842.000|20110130152845.000|CC1|         young adults.          
20110130152845.000|20110130152845.000|CC1|  Cymbalta is not approved for  
20110130152845.000|20110130152848.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20110130152848.000|20110130152848.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20110130152848.000|20110130152850.000|CC1|          thioridazine          
20110130152850.000|20110130152850.000|CC1| or with uncontrolled glaucoma  
20110130152850.000|20110130152853.000|CC1|   should not take Cymbalta.    
20110130152853.000|20110130152853.000|CC1|   Taking it with NSAID pain    
20110130152853.000|20110130152854.000|CC1|           relievers,           
20110130152854.000|20110130152854.000|CC1| aspirin, or blood thinners may 
20110130152854.000|20110130152857.000|CC1|    increase bleeding risk.     
20110130152857.000|20110130152857.000|CC1|  Severe liver problems, some   
20110130152857.000|20110130152859.000|CC1|     fatal, were reported.      
20110130152859.000|20110130152859.000|CC1|Signs include abdominal pain and
20110130152859.000|20110130152903.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes. 
20110130152903.000|20110130152903.000|CC1|Talk with your doctor about your
20110130152903.000|20110130152905.000|CC1|           medicines,           
20110130152905.000|20110130152905.000|CC1|including those for migraine, or
20110130152905.000|20110130152907.000|CC1|    if you have high fever,     
20110130152907.000|20110130152909.000|CC1|  confusion and stiff muscles,  
20110130152909.000|20110130152909.000|CC1|     to address a possible      
20110130152909.000|20110130152911.000|CC1|  life-threatening condition.   
20110130152911.000|20110130152911.000|CC1| Tell your doctor about alcohol 
20110130152911.000|20110130152913.000|CC1|      use, liver disease,       
20110130152913.000|20110130152913.000|CC1| and before you reduce or stop  
20110130152913.000|20110130152916.000|CC1|        taking Cymbalta.

20110130152916.000|20110130152918.000|CC1|         upon standing.
